previewArticle.title: Sporting KC vs. Cruz Azul | CONCACAF Champions League Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting KC 1, Cruz Azul 0 | CONCACAF Champions League Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Zusi probably hits that on frame 99 of 100 times. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Claudio Bieler.

timelineItems.name: Ryan S. Hall
timelineItems.text: Ben looks pretty uh... Spry. #SKC

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Cruz Azul playing almost exclusively up the right side of the field so far. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Eric shoemaker
timelineItems.text: @the_bse back at sporting park. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Derek Harvey
timelineItems.text: Big game for Sporting. A lot to prove against a solid team. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: It is a BEAUTIFUL night unexpectedly. Not having to wear my coat yet. :-) Zeus the front man here on the left. Love that #8!! #SKCvCAZ #concacaf  #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul).
Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Nick Paradise
timelineItems.text: I believe that we will win. #sportingkc

timelineItems.comment: Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Corbin Cannon
timelineItems.text: How can this announcer get EVERY @SportingKC player name wrong? #SKCvCAZ #CCL #IBELIEVETHATWEWILLWIN

timelineItems.comment: Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luis Perea (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC and Cruz Azul deadlocked, but not without action in front of goal. Game will open up as it progresses. 0-0, 16' #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: So far don't think anyone will be displeased with the quality of play #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Kevin Ellis haters, where y'all be at right now? #SportingKC #SKCvCAZ #ccl4

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Kevin Ellis gives #SportingKC a 1-0 lead in the 17th minute. This is Ellis' fourth career start.

timelineItems.comment: Alejandro Castro (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Eric shoemaker
timelineItems.text: Skc 1-0 Cruz Azul #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (17') | Kevin Ellis recibe una excelente pelota de Claudio Bieler, y abre la cuenta con un derechazo pegado al palo. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Claudio Bieler with the pinpoint, outside-of-the-foot curler from the far side to Ellis. Lovely goal all the way round. #SportingKC #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.comment: Luis Perea (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).
Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Alan
timelineItems.text: That, I believe, is a goal. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! @SportingKC Homegrown Kevin Ellis opens the scoring. 1-0 up: http://t.co/plVeU9Ovb1 #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Katherine Rupp
timelineItems.text: Kevin Ellis getting a goal in a #CCL game? I'll take it! #SKCvCAZ #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Rogelio Chávez.
Foul by Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City).
Alejandro Castro (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: More #ccl tonight. Let's see what the #mls champions, #skc, can do against the best Liga MX has to offer.. #kcvcruz

timelineItems.name: TheRealNaranja
timelineItems.text: Looks weird without the Silver Puma in Goal #SKC #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Cruz Azul. Julio C. Domínguez tries a through ball, but Joao Rojas is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rob W
timelineItems.text: The "all teams in MLS play ugly soccer" myth was pretty much shredded by that sequence from SKC, great goal #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, Cruz Azul 0.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GAME OVER! @Kev_Ellis4 scores the game-winning goal as #SportingKC defeats @Cruz_Azul_FC 1-0 in the #CCL QFs! http://t.co/8NXly5HwUm

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GAME OVER! @Kev_Ellis4 scores the game-winning goal as #SportingKC defeats @Cruz_Azul_FC 1-0 in the #CCL QFs! http://t.co/8NXly5HwUm

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FINAL | @SportingKC toma ventaja en los cuartos de final sobre @Cruz_Azul_FC ---> http://t.co/IwKPzt660c #SKCvCAZ 1-0 http://t.co/OVLd24Mu3V

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FINAL | @SportingKC toma ventaja en los cuartos de final sobre @Cruz_Azul_FC ---> http://t.co/IwKPzt660c #SKCvCAZ 1-0 http://t.co/OVLd24Mu3V

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Cruz Azul in a fighting mood. Pushing and shoving now after a mostly clean game. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: What we would have called a #SKC reserve team last season is beating the best team in #LigaMX. Be happy #MLS. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul).
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Graham Zusi tries a through ball, but Ike Opara is caught offside.
Foul by Rogelio Chávez (Cruz Azul).
Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: AMARILLA (23') | Rogelio Chávez recibe la primera amonestación por una falta en el mediocampo. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #MLSLove RT @FCDallas: OK, @SportingKC we're rooting for you guys tonight. But only tonight. #SeeYouSaturday #DTID #RedFor90 #CCL

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Rogelio Chavez picks up a yellow card in the 23rd minute. He will now be suspended for the second leg in Mexico City on March 19. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: (24') | Chávez recibe su segunda amarilla del torneo, por lo cual no podrá jugar en la vuelta en Ciudad de México. #CCL #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Uribe
timelineItems.text: Chávez y Rojas no se asocian. Flores y Fabián lo mismo. #CruzAzul juega disperso.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Wow. Cruz with two strikers deemed onside. Bad touch lets #SportingKC off the hook.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Rojas with great run and lousy touch for Cruz Azul. Actually, three steps below lousy.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: misssarah_25
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: CONCACAF
timelineItems.text: .@Cruz_Azul_FC has won all 6 of its previous #CCL quarterfinal games by a combined score of 11-1 ... #CONCACAF @SportingKC #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Luis Amaranto Perea en marca personal, prácticamente su sombra, sobre Claudio Bieler. Será el duelo de la noche. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Jason Marquitz
timelineItems.text: Once again, Cruz Azul rarely win on possession. Their lineup is mentally incapable of holding the ball. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: smccracken11
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC! #newseason #goal #ibelievethatwewillwin

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Roehl Sybing
timelineItems.text: As far as American soccer has come, #MLS teams in #CCL still compete like they're the #USMNT in '94. Score, then bunker like it's the Alamo.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: A minute into the game, #SportingKC have NEVER been pressed like this before. Looks like they're playing against themselves. #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.name: soy tu luna ✨
timelineItems.text: Blue hell w Henry!! ⚽️� #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Rosell up and back in after taking ball to the face. Tough.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Meet @Kev_Ellis4: A Kansas City, Mo. native & @SportingKC's 2nd Homegrown signing in club history: http://t.co/FTg4tbbs4B #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: Hope Uri is OK. Most important player on this SKC team. #CCL #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: jbazata
timelineItems.text: First time watching a championship team. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: So according to TV, it's "Uri Russell." Can't wait to see if Adela Dazeem subs in tonight.

timelineItems.name: Janet González ���
timelineItems.text: #soccer #kansascity #sportingkc #sportsfanatic #sports #latina #kc #goodtimes #igers #igdaily #instagramhub

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Rogelio Chávez.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Great team defense from #SportingKC so far in this match. Everyone getting back and marking.

timelineItems.comment: Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul).
Attempt saved. Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin Ellis.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jesús Corona.

timelineItems.name: Lili G
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC haciendo un gran trabajo a nivel defensivo, Cruz Azul un poco lento en el ataque #Concachampions #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) header from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Maren Ludwig
timelineItems.text: That was quite the rip from Ike. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Often said #SKC's strength is the defense. Didn't realise that was true at both ends of the pitch. Nice shot, Opara. #CCL #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: CONCACAF
timelineItems.text: .@SportingKC is tied with #Alajuelense for least amount of goals conceded in 2013-14 #CCL group stage (1 goal) ... #CONCACAF @ldacr

timelineItems.name: Gnarlymutt
timelineItems.text: Soccer peeps, help a rookie out... What is this #CCL thing my #SportingKC team is playing in?

timelineItems.comment: Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Goal by Ellis. Save forced by Opara from distance. Cruz Azul has to be wondering if their plane landed in the Twilight Zone.

timelineItems.comment: Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rogelio Chávez (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Astroheader
timelineItems.text: I haven't seen an #MLS team look as bloodthirsty in #CCL as #SKC does right now. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul).
Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Stay modest, @Cruz_Azul_FC. Never forget #SanZusi and what he did for your country. #SKCvCAZ #CCL http://t.co/DzHi0MU8kT

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Stay modest, @Cruz_Azul_FC. Never forget #SanZusi and what he did for your country. #SKCvCAZ #CCL http://t.co/DzHi0MU8kT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) header from a difficult angle on the left is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: Joe Ryan
timelineItems.text: And there came a day, a day unlike any other when @Kev_Ellis4 was trending on Twitter. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Weber
timelineItems.text: People criticize MLS for being too physical should take a look at Cruz Azul. Holy hell. #SportingKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Brian Roberts
timelineItems.text: This guy calling the #SKCvCAZ game needs to learn pronunciations of players and the state he is in. You're not in Missouri. #ChampionsLeague

timelineItems.name: Kelly Anne Wieland
timelineItems.text: Go KC! #sportingkc #stacksonstacksonstacks #fpbitches @catdaddee

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Gerardo Flores.

timelineItems.name: Jason Mitchum
timelineItems.text: You've got to love how Sporting is dictating the play. Cruz Azul looks a little flustered. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Scott VanCompernolle
timelineItems.text: Go Sporting. #sportingkc. #skc

timelineItems.name: Ben Mantooth
timelineItems.text: Really strange not seeing @PumaNielsen1 in goal for Sporting KC tonight, but @Ekronberg is looking good so far! #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).
Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Uribe
timelineItems.text: Si tu cerebro (Formica) no tiene la pelota, simple... No puede crear. #CruzAzul

timelineItems.name: Diego Gutierrez
timelineItems.text: This 4-1-2-3 for #SKC is very balanced and disciplined so far

timelineItems.name: Whitney M. Yadrich
timelineItems.text: Sporting is winning the hair matchup. #analysis #SportingKC #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kevin Ellis.

timelineItems.name: Ashley Page
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC first game ever! #azgirl http://t.co/8pP9pTGhDe

timelineItems.name: Ashley Page
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC first game ever! #azgirl http://t.co/8pP9pTGhDe

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jesús Corona.

timelineItems.name: Kevin
timelineItems.text: Pretty good #CCL game here, Sporting needs to get a second though for insurance

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Never seen Bieler this active, involved and dangerous in every attack. Such a different player than he was last year. #SportingKC #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ronald Moreno
timelineItems.text: Gran atajada de Corona que evita el segundo de SKC enviando el balón a córner. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Well done Bieler. Unlucky. #skcvcruz #mls #ccl

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: AMARILLA (45') | Kevin Ellis, autor del gol, es amonestado por protestarle al árbitro. #SKCvCAZ 1-0 #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Ellis doing it all in this one. Earns a yellow in the 45th minute. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SportingKC WUFC
timelineItems.text: Yellow card to Kevin after an accident when they flattened two of our guys and didn't get crap!!! NICE REF!! #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
First Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, Cruz Azul 0.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Near-perfect 1st half from #SportingKC. All about limiting Cruz Azul's chances, and they've done well thus far. 135 min. to go. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: PT | @SportingKC 1-0 @Cruz_Azul_FC - Con el gol de Ellis, los locales se van al descanso en ventaja. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martinez
timelineItems.text: Not sure, but has MLS sides dominated the table leaders in Liga MX last 2 nights? Just sayin' #KCvCAZ #CCL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Bart Ewing
timelineItems.text: I think SKC is the better team more importantly SKC believe it #SKCNation #SportingKC #CruzAzul

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: #SKC out-shooting Cruz Azul in the first half, and from better locations. #SKCvCAZ http://t.co/N9JDN3wBCV

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: #SKC out-shooting Cruz Azul in the first half, and from better locations. #SKCvCAZ http://t.co/N9JDN3wBCV

timelineItems.name: Aaron Cathey
timelineItems.text: At the risk of jinxing us, we look really good. #SKCvCAZ #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Second quarter under way.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Inicia por @UnivisionSports la segunda parte de la ida de los cuartos de la Champions, @SportingKC 1-0 @Cruz_Azul_FC #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Dave Scimeca
timelineItems.text: It's 2014. There's no excuse for a live sporting event not being available in HD. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Rogelio Chávez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alex Hamby
timelineItems.text: Not gonna lie... These Cruz Azul fans know how to get wild #SKC

timelineItems.name: Matt Pello
timelineItems.text: Took @akswanson to her first Sporting KC game courtesy of my Godmother's business club passes. View from our box is unreal! #SKC #Sporting #CONCACAF #MLS

timelineItems.name: cricket771
timelineItems.text: Back at our second home!!! #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Kronberg, Ellis, Opara, Nagamura, Zizzo - where did the KC first team go? #CCL

timelineItems.name: Michael Zuniga
timelineItems.text: oops? #sportingkc #louder

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Nebel
timelineItems.text: Oh my. I am so excitednervous for this game. #SKC #CCL #ForChampions

timelineItems.name: djphoto76
timelineItems.text: Missed you, baby #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Zac Webb
timelineItems.text: Can't find myself cheering on #SKC tonight. Bitter? Maybe. But I want #RSL to be the first #MLS team to win the #CCL #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Stacey
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC came out ready to play with some aggressive attacking up front. This is the soccer you fall in love with #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: CNSCasey
timelineItems.text: So, the south stands are basically the Azul Hell tonight. Very loud. Very well represented. #Cauldron got some work to do. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: misssarah_25
timelineItems.text: We're back!  #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: SKC's back line is 75 percent KC guys.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Short-sleeve update: 3 for Cruz Azul, 5 for #SportingKC. Advantage: home team. #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.name: jessdamian12
timelineItems.text: This chica's first Couldron experience!!! So flipping excited!! #sportingkc @jagdwyer

timelineItems.text: Opara for Prez!!!! #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Stimpson
timelineItems.text: So you know it's real out hurr! #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Ashley Powell
timelineItems.text: I'm Kronberg-undy? #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Matt Terrill
timelineItems.text: Wow. Replay shows Benny went full Luis Suarez World Cup 2010 to keep that last Cruz Azul shot out. Lucky the ref didn't spot it. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Kayla Knapp
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber, you lucky duck. #ccl

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from long range on the right is too high. Assisted by Oriol Rosell.

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Mendez
timelineItems.text: If #SKC get "CONCACAF'd" in Mexico next week, I don't want to hear it from #SKC fans. Getting some VERY generous calls. Handball. Red.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Uri Rosell is where opposing possessions go to die.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Cruz Azul. Joao Rojas tries a through ball, but Mariano Pavone is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: CAMBIO (58') | Jacob Peterson ingresa al partido reemplazando a Sal Zizzo. #SKCvCAZ 1-0 #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Luis Perea.
Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Bean Mace
timelineItems.text: This announcer has said "fair play" 341 times now. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Jæy Bell
timelineItems.text: It's going to be a super long week with everyone getting their hopes up for #MLS teams in the #CCL before those dreams are dashed next week.

timelineItems.name: Joshua
timelineItems.text: Jacob Peterson comes into the game. And the #SportingKC offense goes dead.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City).
Rogelio Chávez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Jason Mitchell
timelineItems.text: Ike Opara having a helluva match for Sporting KC thus far. Hard to see Cruz Azul not finding the back of the net, though. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Been a WHILE since Zusi's uncorked one like that. Post is still rattling. #SportingKC #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: TRAVESAÑO (64') | GRAHAM ZUSI con un latigazo desde fuera del área que se estrella en el larguero, mientras Corona la veía pasar. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Eric Gómez
timelineItems.text: This is what the #CCL needs, a punch-for-punch affair between two good teams who are giving it their all.

timelineItems.name: Aaron
timelineItems.text: That was dipping quickly. 2 inches lower and that was a goal. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Don't give @gzusi that much time to line up a shot. That's 101. #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Roehl Sybing
timelineItems.text: #SKC appealing for handball. That's funny. #CCL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Chris G. Shaw
timelineItems.text: In the thick of it. 1-0 Sporting. #skc #concacaf

timelineItems.name: Steve DuBois
timelineItems.text: Only just occurred to me that the CCL quarterfinal is, technically, Blue Cross vs. Blue Shield. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Bill Reese
timelineItems.text: Sporting have no real "change" kit. All shades of blue. What will the wear in the return leg against the blue/white combo of Cruz Azul? #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Jason Marquitz
timelineItems.text: Great ball from Fabian to Rojas and it's squandered again. So sloppy with good opportunities tonight. #CruzAzul #CCL

timelineItems.name: Alex Boyer
timelineItems.text: Goodness this is making me nervous. Don't like it when #SportingKC is in a back and forth game like this. Need Dwyer to keep up with it.

timelineItems.comment: Julio C. Domínguez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).
Hand ball by Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Jasmond Madison
timelineItems.text: SKC needs to score another goal or they are gonna get punished in Mexico. #SKCvsCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Mauro Formica.

timelineItems.name: Courtney King
timelineItems.text: Chillin at the #SKC gamee⚽️ http://t.co/UKmsZXcdcI

timelineItems.name: Courtney King
timelineItems.text: Chillin at the #SKC gamee⚽️ http://t.co/UKmsZXcdcI

timelineItems.comment: Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Luis Perea (Cruz Azul) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Christian Giménez with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: AZEjayhawk
timelineItems.text: Our defense has got to figure it out. It's only a matter of time before bad things happen if they don't. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: CJ Sapong ready to enter the game, presumably for Bieler. Great shift from him tonight. #SportingKC #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Sapong getting some final instructions from the coaches. Looks to be coming in soon. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Oriol Rosell.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: Sick of all of this negativity about how #SKC will be demolished in one week. As long as we keep possession, we should be fine. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luis Perea (Cruz Azul).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Paco Valdés
timelineItems.text: Ayer ningún equipo mexicano ganó ni #Toluca ni #SantosLaguna ni #León y hoy #CruzAzul está perdiendo solo falta #Tijuana para unirse al club

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: AMARILLA (75') | Luis Amaranto Perea recibe la segunda amonestación de Cruz Azul por derribar a Graham Zusi. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: Jessica Janasz
timelineItems.text: Me and my girls in the Cauldron! I BELIEVE! #sportingkc @ashley_ruth @rjanose

timelineItems.comment: Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).
Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Sapong for Feilhaber. Don't expect Bieler on Saturday vs. Dallas. #SportingKC #SKCvCAZ

timelineItems.name: Grant Wahl
timelineItems.text: KC selling out tonight takes CCL to a new level in MLS.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber? You're going to swap Sapong in for FEILHABER? Vermes must really want to go for the jugular if Bieler's still in. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: CAMBIO (76') | Ingresa al partido CJ Sapong en lugar de Benny Feilhaber en los locales. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).
Alejandro Castro (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: AMARILLA (77') | Seth Sinovic amonestado por quemar tiempo en un saque de banda. Se pierde la vuelta en Ciudad de México. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Seth Sinovic picks up a yellow card for delaying a restart. He will now miss the second leg due to yellow card accumulation #CCL

timelineItems.name: Billy DT Greenwood
timelineItems.text: Seth Sinovic given a yellow for the penalty of looking too sexy, I assume #SportingKC @ssinovic

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Luis Perea.

timelineItems.name: Mark the Overseer
timelineItems.text: Game on! #IBelieveThatWeWillWin http://t.co/pqYJUIHE8w

timelineItems.name: Mark the Overseer
timelineItems.text: Game on! #IBelieveThatWeWillWin http://t.co/pqYJUIHE8w

timelineItems.name: Peter Berkes
timelineItems.text: Ohohoho that could've been bad #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: So Sinovic will miss the next game, but we get Collin back... so does that mean we're right back where we started? #SKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Dwyer getting instruction on sideline, looks to be making entrance momentarily. #SKCvCAZ #CCLl 80' 1-0, #SportingKC leads

timelineItems.comment: Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Sinovic should already have been booked for earlier off-ball foul. No sympathy here. #ccl

timelineItems.name: alana33
timelineItems.text: #sportingkc #blue #SKCvCAZ #wedefendtogether

timelineItems.name: Tim Stout
timelineItems.text: Would enjoy an NFL films esque show for MLS, specifically mic on Vermes for a game #SKC

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Another goal would be pivotal for #SportingKC's hope of advancing. Just over five minutes remaining, plus stoppage time. #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.name: Lili G
timelineItems.text: San Corona vs. San Zusi #cruzazul #SportingKC #Concachampions

timelineItems.name: Megan
timelineItems.text: Kronberg, keeping goals and hearts safe since 2014. #SKC #WeDefendTogether

timelineItems.name: Melissa Edwards
timelineItems.text: #SportingKc with my guy @realhalco #LetsGoSporting

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Julio C. Domínguez (Cruz Azul).
Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: themarpar
timelineItems.text: #skc

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Mendez
timelineItems.text: I don't know why people hate on #CCL. These quarterfinals, for the most part, have been quite enjoyable.

timelineItems.text: Peanut butter jelly time! #IBELIEVETHATWEWILLWIN #SKC http://t.co/Ip70wg0AKi

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: CAMBIO (87') | Sale ovacionado Claudio "Taca" Bieler, quien es reemplazado por el inglés Dom Dwyer. #SKCvCAZ 1-0 #CCL

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Bieler was huge tonight. Not perfect, but committed.

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: This is one of those games where the #MLS team defends and defends and defends and then gives up a garbage goal in the 92nd, isn't it? #CCL

timelineItems.name: Marco Cervantes
timelineItems.text: No entiendo por que NO hacer cambios en un partido que vas perdiendo y juegas mal. En serio no entiendo. #CruzAzul

timelineItems.comment: Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Not sure if cross. Not sure if shot. Definitely miss on either.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Sal Zizzo.

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Think Cruz Azul got CONCACAF'd with that offside call. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: AMARILLA (90') | CJ Sapong es amonestado por discutir con sus rivales. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: Nick Chadbourne
timelineItems.text: I bet the ref can't wait til this one's over. CJ Sapong shown a yellow after getting into a tussle with a Cruz player. #skc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: AMARILLA (90') | Alejandro Castro recibe su segunda tarjeta del torneo y se pierde la vuelta en Ciudad de México. #SKCvCAZ 1-0

timelineItems.name: Xochitl Lopez
timelineItems.text: Two of my favorite people � #sportingkc

Julio C. Domínguez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ronald Moreno
timelineItems.text: Con esta amonestación, Alejandro Castro se pierde el juego de vuelta. #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Julio C. Domínguez (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Jason Marquitz
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC not familiar with the Boy Who Cried Wolf story. Argue vociferously for every call for 90 minutes ... not the best strategy. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Kelly Tomlinson
timelineItems.text: #sportingkc #IBELIEVETHATWEWILLWIN http://t.co/VhSqnoerVw

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: That's it. #SportingKC take a 1-0 series lead into the second leg next Wednesday in Mexico City. They've got a chance. #SKCvCAZ #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, Cruz Azul 0.
